about.title: About
about.body: I am passionate about creating and have a peculiar interest in knowing how things work, which led me to the world of web development. Since then, I have accepted the challenge and commitment to be a constantly evolving self-taught learner.
about.body1: I have experience in front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and React, and I have collaborated on various projects using frameworks like NextJs and Astro.
about.body2: When I'm not in the digital world, I consider myself a video game enthusiast, I enjoy extreme sports like skateboarding and mountain biking, and I express my creativity through drawing and music.

experience.title: Experience
experience.functions11: - Creation and maintenance of attractive and functional user interfaces, with a responsive approach, thus ensuring compatibility with different devices and browsers.
experience.functions12: - Performing functional and usability tests to identify and correct errors in the code.
experience.functions13: - Consumption of GraphQL APIs to obtain and display dynamic data in the web application.

projects.title: Projects
projects.cardBody1: I am collaborating on a digital platform created for the daily management of pharmacies.
projects.cardBody2: Crafting a captivating landing page for showcasing a standout product and driving conversions.
projects.cardBody3: Designing an immersive landing page for a dynamic video game, enticing players to explore its virtual realm.
projects.cardBody4: Delivering inspiration and wisdom with each click.

footer.title: With help of and inspired by
